ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package Neufchatel cheese, 2 teaspoons lemon zest, finely chopped, 2 tablespoons honey, or to taste, 1 cup chopped kiwi fruit, 16 slices whole wheat bread
nutrition: Total Fat 9g 11%, Saturated Fat 5g 23%, Cholesterol 21mg 7%, Sodium 381mg 17%, Total Carbohydrate 32g 12%, Dietary Fiber 5g 16%, Total Sugars 10g, Protein 10g, Vitamin C 21mg 106%, Calcium 90mg 7%, Iron 2mg 9%, Potassium 245mg 5%
